title: Argentina : poverty headcount ratio at 3.20 U.S. dollars per day 2005 to 2017
summary: Overall Percentage of population has decreased over the Year.

Percentage of population is roughly constant from 2008 to 2009, rapidly decreasing from 2009 to 2011, roughly constant from 2011 to 2012, slightly increasing from 2012 to 2013, and finally slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2017.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2009 and 2010.
Maximum Percentage of population, about 6.2 was reported at Year 2008
Minimum Percentage of population about 2.0 was reached at Year 2017
